name: Geto Gecko!
description:
Have a small and cute date with Suguru Geto at the Gecko Café!

This is based on an AU version of Suguru Geto thought of by mmmlarte.
We hope you enjoy! ♥

Credits:
Story and Coding - jassydaPOO
BGM - Café Sound Music by paulmessier
Art - mmmlarte
Suguru Geto from Jujustu Kaisen
